divs: Sighting Details1. On way home from Sonic on Highway 59. 2. The strange behavior of the object. Spotlights, disappearing & reappearing & hovering over trees. 3. Thought it was an airplane until I realized object wasn't moving. 4. Couldn't tell the shape. Object was dark with red & white lights. Would shine down a light towards trees. Disappear for about 15 seconds then would reappear in same spot. Hovering over trees. 5. Was a little freaked out. Thought our town was going to be invaded. 6. Stopped, got out of car & tried taking a video of it. That's when it disappeared.
Summary: Object would disappear & reappear in same spot.
trends: there have been no other sightings in cleveland\ splendora
This sighting has never been favorited.
